findings.title: Potential abuse of registerToken function by admin
findings.description: An admin might change the address of a low-value token to high-value token before calling the withdrawByAdmin.

findings.title: Incorrect Bitwise Data Decoder
findings.description: In some functions, parameters are accessed directly using array/byte offset with different meanings, leading to incorrect bitwise data decoder problems inside JoysoDataDecoder.sol library while extracting binary parts of uint256 buffer using division.
